title: Luxury Hotels in Bangalore Elevate Hospitality to a Different Dimension (shobna malhotra)
text: By shobna malhotra Aug 28, 2015 For a sophisticated modern city, where IT savvy companies proliferate the hi-tech business environment, where the "Silicon Valley of India" - by which exotic sobriquet this progressive capital city of Karnataka - Bangalore - is rightly known, high class business and leisure visitors are frequent guests. Luxury hotels in Bangalore have mushroomed in consonance with the fast-paced lifestyle and progress here, to accommodate guests who sojourn here often and on business, for luxurious leisure holidays with their family and friends.Such leading and exquisite three star hotels near Majestic Bangalore provide savvy travellers with multiple advantages and privileges. Situated in proximity to the City Centre of this gracious Garden City with its manicured and colourful gardens and impressive Dravidian architecture and grand palaces, they are eloquent ambassadors of Bangalore's hospitality culture.Such luxury hotels in Bangalore , which munificently provide the discerning traveller with approximately ten dozen luxuriously furnished and spacious Standard and Deluxe rooms and exclusive suites endowed with facilities like mini-bar, coffee and tea maker, in-house safe, self-controlled centralized A/C and Wi-Fi facility, look after their valued clientele solicitously. With Plasma TV with satellite cable and round the clock in-room dining to leisurely savoured multi-cuisine delicious and robust Indian food, you are well cared for here!Such hotels near Majestic Bangalore also provide a melange of hotel services to enrich the stay of their valued guests and you can enjoy an invigorating swim in the rooftop swimming pool, do vigorous work-outs in the excellently fitted out Fitness Centre, shop at the Gift Shop for mementoes to take back for loved ones or utilize the helpful travel desk to plan out your sightseeing of some important tourist places in and around Bangalore. With an efficient on-site business centre, an in-house laundry, some serene meditation at the Mahatma Gandhi Meditation Centre or entertaining yourself with home theatre, there are many options for leisure and enjoyment.The 9 halls in such luxury hotels in Bangalore offers the best banqueting facilities and spacious seating for the guests to conduct business endeavours or savour a fulsome feast with culinary preparations crafted by master chefs! There is also a laid back lounge bar where you can enjoy some of the finest wines and spirits with friends or to celebrate a special event. With a pleasing multi-cuisine cafe to titillate your taste-buds, you are all set to have a real blast.With versatile meeting spaces equipped with state-of-the-art business facilities, keeping in mind the diverse needs of the corporate traveller, it makes luxury hotels in Bangalore one of best choices in which to host conferences and other related corporate and business events, competently! Business events or celebratory occasions, family get-togethers and milestone occasions, you can be sure to hold your head up high! About the Author The author has stayed in several business and luxury hotels in India and is one of the foremost authorities on them. The author's articles are a good source for people looking for information about luxury hotels in Bangalore and hotels near Majestic Bangalore . Rating:
